languages.text: "Хоть не зря я слушал{mf||а} твою болтовню. Прощай, старик!"
"At least listening to your blathering hasn't been a waste of time. Farewell, old man!"
languages.original_text: "Хоть не зря я слушал{mf||а} твою болтовню. Прощай, старик!"

traits.locale_text: "At least listening to your blathering hasn't been a waste of time. Farewell, old man!"
"At least listening to your blathering hasn't been a waste of time. Farewell, old man!"
"At least listening to your blathering hasn't been a waste of time. Farewell, old man!"
"At least listening to your blathering hasn't been a waste of time. Farewell, old man!"
"At least listening to your blathering hasn't been a waste of time. Farewell, old man!"

languages.text: 「暇つぶしに付き合うのも無駄にならずに済んでよかった。さらばだ、老人よ！」
languages.original_text: "At least listening to your blathering hasn't been a waste of time. Farewell, old man!"

traits.locale_text: 「暇つぶしに付き合うのも無駄にならずに済んでよかった。さらばだ、老人よ！」

languages.text: “至少我没白听你唠叨。再见了，老家伙！”
languages.original_text: "At least listening to your blathering hasn't been a waste of time. Farewell, old man!"

traits.locale_text: “至少我没白听你唠叨。再见了，老家伙！”

languages.text: «¡Al menos sus monsergas no han sido una pérdida de tiempo. ¡Hasta pronto, señor!».
languages.original_text: "At least listening to your blathering hasn't been a waste of time. Farewell, old man!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Al menos sus monsergas no han sido una pérdida de tiempo. ¡Hasta pronto, señor!».

languages.text: « Au moins, écouter vos élucubrations n'aura pas été une perte de temps. Au revoir, vieil homme ! »
languages.original_text: "At least listening to your blathering hasn't been a waste of time. Farewell, old man!"

traits.locale_text: « Au moins, écouter vos élucubrations n'aura pas été une perte de temps. Au revoir, vieil homme ! »

languages.text: "Wenigstens war es keine Zeitverschwendung, Eurem Gefasel zuzuhören. Lebt wohl, alter Mann!"
languages.original_text: "At least listening to your blathering hasn't been a waste of time. Farewell, old man!"

traits.locale_text: "Wenigstens war es keine Zeitverschwendung, Eurem Gefasel zuzuhören. Lebt wohl, alter Mann!"

languages.text: "En azından zırvalıklarına harcadığım zaman boşa gitmemiş oldu. Hadi kendine iyi bak ihtiyar!"
languages.original_text: "At least listening to your blathering hasn't been a waste of time. Farewell, old man!"

traits.locale_text: "En azından zırvalarını dinledim diye zamanımı boşa harcamış olmadım. Hadi kendine iyi bak ihtiyar!"
